welcome_message_body: Welcome to Braga, Portugal! Get ready to immerse yourself in the charming atmosphere of this historic city, known for its stunning architecture, vibrant culture, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Braga has to offer.

restaurants.name: Café A Brasileira
restaurants.description: Café A Brasileira is a café located in Braga.
restaurants.address: Lg. do Barão S. Martinho, 17 (R. de S. Marcos), 4700-306 Braga

restaurants.name: Gosto Superior
restaurants.description: Gosto Superior is a vegan and vegetarian restaurant located in Braga.

restaurants.name: DeGema Hamburgueria Artesanal
restaurants.description: DeGema Hamburgueria Artesanal is a burger joint located in Braga.
restaurants.address: Pç. Dr. José Augusto Ferreira Salgado (R. Dr. Justino Cruz), 4700-314 Braga

restaurants.name: Restaurante Silvas
restaurants.description: Restaurante Silvas is a restaurant located in Braga.
restaurants.address: C. C. Granjinhos (R. 25 de Abril), Braga

restaurants.name: Casa Estarolas
restaurants.description: Casa Estarolas is a portuguese restaurant located in Braga.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Braga Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
